subject: Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: U.C.L.A. built an insurmountable lead in the second half Saturday with a swarming defense and an offense that played at two different speeds. Guard Arron Afflalo led the way with 24 points.
snippet: U.C.L.A. built an insurmountable lead in the second half Saturday with a swarming defense and an offense that played at two different speeds. Guard Arron Afflalo led the way with 24 points.
